text: Ara allaha ya nayila karechena apani se anuyayi bicara nispatti karuna o tadera kheyala-khusira anusarana karabena na ebam tadera byapare satarka hona, yate allaha apanara prati ya nayila karechena tara era kono kichu hate apanake bicyuta na kare. Atahpara yadi tara mukha phiriye neya, tabe jene rakhuna ye, allaha taderake kebala tadera kono kono papera jan'ya sasti dite cana. Ara niscaya manusera madhye aneke'i to phaseka
